lead_paragraph: The European Union’s military mission said in a Twitter post that its headquarters in Bamako had been assaulted. It reported no casualties.

byline.contributor: Dionne Searcey contributed reporting from Dakar, Senegal.

headline.print_headline: Attack Reported on E.U. Mission at Hotel in Mali
headline.main: Attack Reported on Mali Hotel Used by European Union Military

snippet: The European Union’s military mission said in a Twitter post that its headquarters in Bamako had been assaulted. It reported no casualties.
abstract: Unidentified assailants attack Nord-Sud hotel in Bamako, Mali, that is headquarters for European Union military officials; no injuries are reported.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
